Generation V.Black: Each follows its Trainer's orders as best it can, but they sometimes fail to understand complicated commands.
Generation V.White: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
Generation V.Black 2: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
Generation V.White 2: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.

Generation VI.X: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
Generation VI.Y: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: This very forgetful Pokémon will wait for a new order from its Trainer even though it already has one.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

Generation VIII.Sword: Where people go, these Pokémon follow. If you're scattering food for them, be careful— several hundred of them can gather at once.
Generation VIII.Shield: It's forgetful and not very bright, but many Trainers love it anyway for its friendliness and sincerity.
